description:
People who can`t readily accept compliments are not confident in themselves?! This episode will explain the "cognitive consistency theory."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kokoro no Byouki ni Nari Yasui Hito no, Muishiki no Pattern
Les façons de penser inconscientes des personnes sujettes aux troubles mentaux
Subconscious Patterns of People Likely to Suffer from Mental Disorders
心の病気になりやすい人の, 無意識のパターン
